name: One Line: Single Stroke Draw
description:
How skillful are you at connecting dots in one go without lifting your finger off the screen?
This FREE-TO-PLAY drawing game is a simple brain-training puzzle that's extremely hard to put down!
Find the best pathway to complete a shape, one stroke at a time!

How to Play
►One simple rule: Draw in & connect all the nails with one single rope
►The line drawing puzzle starts off quite easy, but don't get carried away! Each level can get very tricky!

How is One Line-Single Stroke Drawing Different?
-Over a thousand LEVELS to dive right in & much more to come!
-Completely RESTART a level if you're stumped, or use HINTS to help you along the way!
-MULTIPLAYER mode is available for you with friends & family!
-Select rope types of your choice to double the fun!
-Most simple & effective way to test your analytical ability! See how clever you are with just one touch!
- Feel the satisfaction of finding the best way in one fell swoop!


Need help? Have Any Questions?
Please contact us at help@bitmango.com

http://www.bitmango.com/

Please Note
-One Line-Single Stroke Drawing can be enjoyed on mobile phones & tablet PCs.
-One Line-Single Stroke Drawing contains ad-like banners, interstitials, videos and/or house ads.
-One Line-Single Stroke Drawing is free to play, however, you may purchase in-app items, such as Ad-Free & hints.
